summary: The importapi package supplies a set of web endpoints and supporting utilities that let external services submit bibliographic records and cover images to Open Library. It parses various source formats (MARC, RDF, OPDS feeds, Internet Archive meta.xml), builds the internal edition metadata structure, matches existing records, searches by library identifiers, and creates new catalog entries when authorized.
business_intent: To streamline the integration of thirdâ€‘party catalog data into Open Library, expanding the collection by allowing automated ingestion of bibliographic information and associated media from diverse sources.
